title: forge fmt does not make the right line breaks to preserve print width

body:
Closing in favor of https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/4450 since this is expected behavior

Line 9 in this example has a length of 101, just one character over the line length, and line length is not a hard requirement as discussed in As mentioned in https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/issues/4021#issuecomment-1448701684. This is common in formatters, e.g. from the prettier [docs](https://prettier.io/docs/en/options.html#print-width):

> Prettier’s printWidth ... is not the hard upper allowed line length limit. It is a way to say to Prettier roughly how long you’d like lines to be. Prettier will make both shorter and longer lines, but generally strive to meet the specified printWidth.
